channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AK lawmakers claim ‘victory’ as feds begin reversal of ‘illegal’ Biden rule restricting ANWR oil and gas
item.description: New rule reversal promises more energy jobs and economic growth while maintaining environmental standards.

item.title: Ex-Homeland Security official Taylor fights back against Trump's 'unprecedented' investigation order
item.description: A former Homeland Security official during President Trump's first administration who authored an anonymous op-ed sharply critical of the president is...

item.title: Election investigation uncovers alleged illegal voting by noncitizens and double voters in multiple states
item.description: Ohio's election integrity investigation finds noncitizen and double voting, leading to potential prosecutions in eight states and Washington, D.C.

item.title: Trump DOJ investigating Biden-era pardons amid concerns over state of mind
item.description: Joe Biden's pardons, including those for Hunter Biden and death row inmates, are under Justice Department review amid concerns about AutoPen use and d...

item.title: SCOOP: Liberal city mayor hit with ethics complaint over alleged lavish gifts
item.description: Washington, D.C., Mayor Muriel Bowser hit with scathing ethics complaint as FACT accused her office of undisclosed travel expenses for high-profile tr...

item.title: Trump threatens 'large scale fines' on California after transgender athlete wins track events
item.description: President Trump threatened Tuesday to impose heavy fines on California after a transgender athlete took home the gold in a girls track and field meet.

item.title: The Intifada in America Moves West
item.description: What makes the Boulder attack especially maddening is that the suspect should not have been in the country in the first place.

item.title: FLASHBACK: US lawmakers, officials warned about terrorist attacks from foreign nationals long before Boulder
item.description: Various officials have long cautioned about the risk of terrorism due to lax border security.

item.title: Trump says any deal with Iran won't allow uranium enrichment
item.description: President Trump this week denied reports that U.S. negotiators offered a deal to Tehran that would let Iran continue its uranium enrichment program.

item.title: Media That Obsessed Over Elon Musk’s Bogus ‘Hitler Salute’ Scandal Breeze Past Antisemitic Violence
item.description: The 'Free Palestine' movement is a threat the lazy media should stop protecting and start investigating.

item.title: U.S. economic growth set to decline in 2025, 2026 due to trade uncertainty, international forum says
item.description: U.S. economic growth is projected to decline to just 1.6% in 2025 and 1.5% in 2026 due to trade uncertainty and other factors, the Organization for Ec...

item.title: Corporate Media Downplayed Suspected Motive, History Of Illegal Alien Charged With Attacking Jews
item.description: The press was reluctant to report on Soliman's immigration status.

item.title: Europe Is Still Figuring Out How to Respond to ‘Liberation Day’
item.description: It’s considering carrots as well as sticks.

item.title: European Populism Is Rising Against An Oppressive Political Elite
item.description: Europe’s political class has turned its back on the people it was supposed to protect. The people have taken notice.

item.title: If Only SCOTUS Cared About Protecting Americans’ Rights As Much As They Do Illegal Aliens
item.description: A Supreme Court more interested in playing politics than faithfully upholding the Constitution is one that will lose Americans' trust.

item.title: Shucked Fills Theaters with Earfuls of Laughs
item.description: A joyously self-aware Broadway musical proves that corny can be funny.

item.title: Why Kids Should Go Cold Turkey On Tech
item.description: After years of parents attempting to implement content controls, screen time limits, and other half measures, Morell is ready to cut the Gordian Knot.

item.title: The Future of Warfare Is Here
item.description: And it features low-cost drones basically indistinguishable from ones available on Amazon.
